name: Salt Golem
immune: fire, poison, psychic; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't adamantine
conditionImmune: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Blinding Salt Spray
text: Any time the golem is hit in combat, thousands of tiny salt crystals erupt from its body. All creatures within 5 feet of the golem must succeed on a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw or become blinded for 1d3 rounds.

trait.name: Immutable Form
text: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
text: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The golem makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (5d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage and the target must make a successful DC 17 Constitution saving throw or gain one level of exhaustion.
